me.timothy.pathfinder.bestiary.models

Class ChallengeRating

  • java.lang.Object
    • me.timothy.pathfinder.bestiary.models.ChallengeRating

  • public class ChallengeRating
extends java.lang.Object
    Describes a challenge rating that an encounter or creature might have.
    Author:
    Timothy

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      int id
      The id of this challenge rating
      int largeGroupIndividualExperience
      How much experience is given to each individual in a large group (6+ players)
      int mediumGroupIndividualExperience
      How much experience is given to each individual in a medium group (4-5 players)
      java.lang.String name
      The name of the challenge rating.
      int smallGroupIndividualExperience
      How much experience is given to each individual in a small group (1-3 players)
      int totalExperience
      Roughly equal to the total experience that is given to an average group.

    • Field Detail

      • id

        public int id
        The id of this challenge rating

      • name

        public java.lang.String name
        The name of the challenge rating. Numerical, such as:
        • 1/4
        • 1/2
        • 1

      • totalExperience

        public int totalExperience
        Roughly equal to the total experience that is given to an average group. Generally there is some rounding error when the experience is actually dished out to make play easier.

      • smallGroupIndividualExperience

        public int smallGroupIndividualExperience
        How much experience is given to each individual in a small group (1-3 players)

      • mediumGroupIndividualExperience

        public int mediumGroupIndividualExperience
        How much experience is given to each individual in a medium group (4-5 players)

      • largeGroupIndividualExperience

        public int largeGroupIndividualExperience
        How much experience is given to each individual in a large group (6+ players)
